content: Yes, the Victron MultiPlus 12/3000/120-50 120V VE.Bus Inverter/Charger comes with an automatic transfer switch (ATS) built-in. The ATS allows the MultiPlus to automatically switch between different power sources, such as shore power, generator power, and battery power, based on the available power sources and the user's configuration settings. This ensures that your RV or other off-grid system always has a reliable source of power and helps to prevent power outages or interruptions.
